name: withCString(encodedAs:_:)
desc: Calls the given closure with a pointer to the contents of the string, represented as a null-terminated sequence of code units.Required.
declaration: func withCString<Result, Encoding>(encodedAs targetEncoding: Encoding.Type, _ body: (UnsafePointer<Encoding.CodeUnit>) throws -> Result) rethrows -> Result where Encoding : _UnicodeEncoding
